pkgmetadata.longdescription: Datasets from the Book "Methods of Multivariate Analysis (3rd)" // Provides the datasets in the book "Methods of Multivariate Analysis (3rd)", such as Table 6.27 Blood Pressure Data, for statistical analysis,especially MANOVA. The dataset names correspond to their numbering in the third edition of the book, such as table6.27. Based on the book by Rencher and Christensen (2012, ISBN:9780470178966).
